vote.title: Reappointment of Trudy Bartley, Assistant Vice President, Local and Community Relations,  The Ohio State University Office of Government Affairs, 300 Bricker Hall, 190 North Oval Mall, Columbus, OH 43210, to serve on the Central Ohio Transit Authority Board of Trustees, with a new term expiration date of March 31, 2024 (biography attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
Reappointment of Trudy Bartley, Assistant Vice President, Local and Community Relations,  The Ohio State University Office of Government Affairs, 300 Bricker Hall, 190 North Oval Mall, Columbus, OH 43210, to serve on the Central Ohio Transit Authority Board of Trustees, with a new term expiration date of March 31, 2024 (biography attached).
